amendment.description: Amendment sought to remove the funding mechanism in the bill for the Affordable Housing Fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 110-330 to strike the allowable use of FHA savings for an affordable housing fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 280 (Roll no. 873).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Hensarling.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 280 (Roll no. 873).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
